name: Deceptive Mikage-san
nutshell: Deceptive Mikage-san

name: Kudou Iori no Jikenbo-miman
nutshell:
"As one would expect, bizarre incidents and difficult cases rarely occur in daily life, right?"
Kudou Iori hates boredom and longs for the unusual. Every day she'll run about looking for "incidents," yet nothing ever happens. Until a "request" is delivered to her...
(Source: Amazon Japan)

name: Perfect Girl
nutshell:
Kujou Yuriko’s nickname is “The Perfect Girl”.
A nickname that was conceived due to her stellarness, beauty, athletic ability, and academic acumen. She is also the school idol who everyone adores. But she has one fatal flaw, she is madly in love with Apollon, a fictional manga character.
Nothing will stop her from collecting Apollon merch, not even the mysterious creatures “Crayshere” which appear from a person’s insecurities.
How will Yuriko defeat the Craysheres? And who are the mysterious beings that hunt the Craysheres? Find out in Aoki Ippei’s “Perfect Girl”!
[The Bread House]

name: I Shall Kill That Sweet Devil
nutshell:
Chloe Garnache is an alluring trap for the emperor.
After living a life full of abuse at the hands of her family, Chloe is finally freed from her torture by the grand duke, Kairos Ludwig.
However, her days of getting taken advantage of are far from over. The only reason Kairos took her in is because of her beauty, which he plans to use in order to lure and kill the emperor. Chloe willingly follows Kairos’ orders, having fallen for his kind and gentle gestures. Unfortunately, her feelings are never returned, and she is met with a pitiful death once her task is fulfilled.
But just when things seem to be over, Chloe awakens to find herself back before her life came spiraling down. And this time, she won’t be swayed by the sweet words of the devilish grand duke…

name: Sumeru Scroll of a Thousand Wishes
nutshell: The young Taoist monk Canglan has descended from the mountain to take his new post at Ruyi Temple. The owner of the Temple, Yan Yeyu, is a devil who has been sealed at Ruyi, and now spends his days sleeping from laziness brought on by his past failures. Canglan's arrival results in the re-opening of the Temple-- In the midst of fulfilling various wishes, Yan Yeyu's burden of past sins is also starting to peel away...

name: Marquis, Leave Me Alone!
nutshell:
“My marquis always has those days every month…to suck blood! What should I do? ”
Su Li, a quirky slave girl, is mistakenly bought by the cold-faced and arrogant Marquis to treat his bloodthirsty disease. In the most horrible Marquis’ residence in the capital, a series of hilarious stories are coming soon…

Links:

Alternative raw (KuaiKan)
Alternative raw (Iqiyi)
Alternative English (Mangatoon)

name: Touhou - The Oni Miko Scarlet Weather Rhapsody (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Sorta sequel to mangadex.org/title/48094 .

name: Hitohake no Niji
nutshell: The story of Fine Art paintings whose subject is "feminine beauty" begins. Set in places such as France, Germany, the Netherlands, and Italy, it tells of the Great Masters: Lucas Cranach the Elder, Caravaggio, Velázquez, Sir John Everett Millais, Walter Ophey, etc. When the artists and beautiful women of the world intersect, a strange "colour" appears. The colour is, for example, the lustre of the rainbow. Guided by its brilliance, the seeker of beauty embarks on an endless journey.

name: Melancholic Spiral
nutshell: Hugo, the model, fell in love with the dancer Hal who met at the Men’s Pole Dance Show. Hal unleashes Hugo who wants to be sweet and hasty…

name: Perfect Appearance
nutshell: A prince found a mysterious potion that is thought to make one more beautiful, so he gave it to his knight. However…

name: 3LDK, Ouji Tsuki
nutshell: Kanta is a poor art student, but one day as he went home to his apartment, he found out that the apartment he’s been living in is being demolished! He was in trouble because he couldn’t find a new house. At that time, the famous Touji who is rich and is called a prince suggested living together with him?! But when they arrived at his house, his image changed?!

name: Midsummer Intro
nutshell: Author's Twitter

name: Renai Kyoushuujo
nutshell: Ran is terrible at love and is always getting rejected. Today’s rejection was witnessed by the most popular prince at school, Takashina-kun! Ran thought she came off as an idiot, but with Takashina supporting her efforts, Ran falls for him! That night Ran left for home late and in a seemingly empty classroom, she encountered a mysterious man in a military uniform. Did Ran discover the love training institute?

name: Haikyuu!! - WORLD QUEST (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Iwaizumi Hajime x Oikawa Tooru

name: Tobidasu! Doubutsuen
nutshell: Kawase Takashi has discovered that he will be learning about caring for animals from the legendary Haruo Minami. It's rumored that she's able to converse with animals, and they tend to all flock around her eagerly. However, she's also very unconventional and more than a little strange. For instance, she dreams of one day ruling a country full just of animals. Will Kawase be able to learn anything useful from such an odd teacher?

name: Konbini Ojousama
nutshell:
Midori is a young lady from a good family, and she should never be caught inside a convenience store. However, when she's really hungry, she craves convenience store food. She sneaks into the store with her face covered, to make sure she isn't spotted by classmates, and then brings the food home to remix in a meal of her own creation. She loves this convenience-store-gourmet style, but is afraid that she will one day be found out!

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as Miss Mini Market (2018)

name: Rules of Lips and Tongue
nutshell: In order to find his mysteriously missing sister, racer Han Zai Yu goes to a famous nightclub called J Club. But rather, he found out the dark industry hidden in the normal business of the nightclub, is a "banquet of ladies" serving the upper class, and he bumps into a mysterious man, Liu Yuan, who disguises himself as a woman and seems to be both good and evil. Can the two find out the hidden secrets of the nightclub? Who controls all this behind the scenes?

name: Jazz
nutshell:
Can a doctor and his patient ever find romance? Wait patiently, because this is one checkup you won't want to miss!
Narusawa and Naoki have way-overstepped the bounds of their doctor-patient relationship. Naoki is instantly attracted to Narusawa, and will stop at nothing to be together with him. One glance into Naoki's despaired eyes and Narusawa caves for Naoki's advances. Will this relationship go beyond a simple fling?

name: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Waiting for Next Spring (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight Doujin featuring the Seiran girls.

name: Pet Wiz
nutshell: Pet shop comics where you can meet cute pets are finally on sale! Sakura who loves animals but is hated by animals & Alice who is scared of animals because she is too liked by animals, the struggle of two people who can not work at a pet shop!

name: Chocolate-Covered Almonds
nutshell: The tiny story about chocolate-covered almonds and feelings.

name: Bishoujo Senshi 04R1
nutshell:
From the author of MachiMaho and Black Gyaru School comes Souryuu's newest work.
Notes:
0 = the letter "O"
4 = the kanji "shi"
R = the letter "r"
1 = the letter "i"
"04R1" becomes "Oshiri"
Japanese for that sweet ass!

name: A Plain High School Girl Is ○○'d by Pretty Girls
nutshell: Just your plain average high school girl, getting involved in yuri shenanigans.

name: Itehoshi no Kalevala
nutshell:
The world is frozen and covered with snow.
Only the "Dragon King" can bring the heat that will melt it.
Under pressure from the harsh cold and her cruel father, a young girl named Heroi cut through the glacier digging for relics. But instead she found a small "baby dragon." Her dream used to be "get rich quick or be frozen into a snowman," but after that day, her destiny changed drastically.......

name: Itsuka Kimitachi mo Otona ni Naru
nutshell: A doting father finds out that his precious daughter has found herself a boyfriend. For any father, this news alone is hard enough to accept. However, when the boyfriend turns out to be a potential lying playboy, this father will stop at nothing to protect his little girl!

name: Umi to Futari no Enbun Noudo
nutshell: Ryuuta has worked a summer job in Naoki's pub for several years, falling deeper and deeper in love with him despite Naoki's long-term girlfriend. But as soon as Ryuuta decides this will be his final summer on the job, he finds out Naoki's girlfriend is gone, and Ryuuta can no longer resist telling Nao-san about his feelings.

name: Zero kara Hajimeru Mahou no Sho Nano!
nutshell:
A half-beast Mercenary is hired by the witch Zero, who searches for the grimoire known as the Book of Zero, and the two set off together on a journey full of hugely chibi adventures!
Chibi comedy spinoff of the Zero kara Hajimeru Mahou no Sho light novel.

name: Ana Satsujin
nutshell:
Who do you think lives next door?
A college student?
A secretary?
A foodie?
A quiet sort
Or… A killer?
This is the birth of a brand-new manga!

name: Iseikai Tensei
nutshell:
Noah, the last survivor from Earth, aims for a new universe on the spaceship that was handed down to him by his mother who was a scientist. What he arrives at is a planet where living things possess magic. When he is out doing field work, he meets a girl who proclaims herself as the demon lord's daughter.
The cyborg youth will traverse a planet full of mysteries in this iseikai sci-fi fantasy.

name: Inu mo Kuwanai
nutshell:
Utsugi is an investigator working for a detective agency. When he's asked to track the wife of a college professor, Yamashiro, he discovers that she's cheating on him with another professor from the same university named Okuzono Shuji.
This isn't the first time this has happened: Okuzono has stolen away the women Yamashiro loves countless times before. These intellectuals are embroiled in a twisted and convoluted relationship, and now this young investigator finds himself thrown into the mix.

name: Rakuen no Izumi
nutshell:
Collection of short stories with very light shounen-ai overtones:


Rakuen no Izumi (A Fountain in Paradise)
Ryuuji is bored and anxious for combat experience, but finds something more while protecting a scientist from one of his own creations.


Phenomena


EREHWON


EREHWON II


Hoshiboshi no Kouya kara (From the Stars of the Wilderness)


Shinya +1 (Midnight Plus One)


Shinya +1 II (Midnight Plus One II)
